content: The Reorder action will remove spaces in the indexes. The files will be re-indexed in order with offset to fill in missing indexes.

comment.text: "This translation key is used for a warning message that indicates the Reorder action will remove spaces from file indexes and re-index files in order to fill missing indexes."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "offsetlə" is not the best translation of "with offset". A more accurate translation would convey the purpose of the offset.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yenidən Sırala əməliyyatı indekslərdən boşluqları siləcək. Fayllar çatışmayan indeksləri doldurmaq üçün növbələşmələ ofsetlə yenidən indeksləşdiriləcək. (or a rephrased version that better conveys the offset's purpose)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "with offset" is not accurately translated. "Отместване" implies a shift or displacement, but in this context, it's about renumbering to fill gaps. A more accurate translation would convey the renumbering aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Файловете ще бъдат индексирани повторно, за да се попълнят липсващите индекси, пренареждайки ги.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "The Reorder action will remove spaces in the indexes" is translated as "Η ενέργεια Αναδιάταξη θα αφαιρέσει τα κενά στα ευρετήρια." While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in Greek might be "Η ενέργεια Αναδιάταξη θα αφαιρέσει τα κενά από τους δείκτες" or "Η ενέργεια Αναδιάταξη θα αφαιρέσει τα κενά στους δείκτες."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Η ενέργεια Αναδιάταξη θα αφαιρέσει τα κενά από τους δείκτες

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "indexes" is translated as "ευρετήρια". While acceptable, “δείκτες” may be more precise and common when referring to index values in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μετατρέψτε το "ευρετήρια" σε "δείκτες" σε όλο το κείμενο.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'offset' is not accurately translated in the Armenian sentence. 'Offset' implies a numerical adjustment or displacement. The current translation doesn't convey this technical meaning. A more accurate translation might involve describing how the files will be re-indexed with a numerical shift.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that explains 'offset' more clearly, e.g., 'Ֆայլերը կվերինդեքսավորվեն թվային շեղումով, որպեսզի լրացվեն բաց թողնված ինդեքսները:' (The files will be re-indexed with a numerical shift to fill in the missing indexes).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of colons might benefit from review for consistency with Armenian style guides. While not strictly incorrect, it's worth verifying with native speakers.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review colon usage against established Armenian writing conventions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "offset順に" (offset-jun ni) while technically correct, could be improved for clarity. 'Offset' in this context refers to adjusting the index positions to compensate for the removed spaces. A more natural Japanese phrasing might better convey this nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 「オフセット値を用いて」 or 「オフセットを適用して」 (offset o tekiyou shite)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "오프셋을 사용하여" (using an offset) could be misinterpreted. While technically correct, it might be clearer to say something like "오프셋을 적용하여" (applying an offset) or simply rephrase to emphasize the re-indexing process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 재정리 작업은 인덱스에서 공간을 제거합니다. 파일은 오프셋을 적용하여 누락된 인덱스를 채우는 순서대로 다시 인덱싱됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຄຳສັ່ງ Reorder" (command Reorder) is slightly awkward. While understandable, it would be more natural to rephrase it, perhaps using something like "ການກະທຳ Reorder" (action Reorder) or describing its function.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການກະທຳ Reorder ຈະລຶບຊ່ອງຫວ່າງໃນດັດຊະນີ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ການຊົດເຊີຍເພື່ອຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ໃນດັດຊະນີທີ່ຂາດຫາຍໄປ" (compensation to fill data into missing indexes) is complex and potentially unclear. A simpler explanation would be better. The nuance of 'offset' in the English is lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໄຟລ໌ຈະຖືກດັດສະນີຄືນໃຫມ່ຕາມລໍາດັບໂດຍເຕີມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ໃນດັດຊະນີທີ່ຂາດຫາຍໄປ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "zgodnie z offsetem" is not the best translation for "with offset". It's a literal translation and doesn't convey the meaning accurately in this context. 'Offset' in this case refers to adjusting the indexes to compensate for the removed spaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more descriptive phrase like "z przesunięciem" or "w celu skompensowania brakujących indeksów" or something that better explains the adjustment of the indexes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'Pliki zostaną ponownie zindeksowane zgodnie z offsetem, aby uzupełnić brakujące indeksy' could be improved for readability. The two clauses are a bit clunky together.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pliki zostaną ponownie zindeksowane z przesunięciem, aby uzupełnić brakujące indeksy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Fișiere vor fi reindexate' is grammatically awkward. It should be 'Fișierele vor fi reindexate' to agree with 'Files'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fișierele vor fi reindexate

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "පුනඃക്രമ කිරීමේ ක්‍රියාවේ" (Punaakrama kirimē krīyavē) is a somewhat formal and less common way to say "Reorder action." A more natural phrasing might be "ගොනුවල නැවත ക്രമീകരണം" (Gonuwala naewath kramakaran) or similar.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ගොනුවල නැවත ക്രමീകരണം (Gonuwala naewath kramakaran) or a more colloquial equivalent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "නැති වූ ඉංඩෙක්ස් හිස් කිරීමට සැලැස්ම සහිතව" (Nathi vuu īnḍēks his kimē sēlaṃ samithava) is overly complex. It doesn't directly convey the meaning of filling in missing indexes with an offset. A clearer translation would focus on the offset.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නැති වූ ඉංඩෙක්ස්වලට අනුබද්ධ ඉවත් කිරීමෙන් නැවත ඉංඩෙක්ස් කරනු ලැබේ (Nathi vuu īnḍēkswala anubaddhawa ivat karamēn naewatha īnḍēks karanū labē) - This focuses on offsetting to fill missing indexes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ඉංඩෙක්ස්' (īnḍēks) is commonly used, it's a transliteration. If attempting a more Sinhala rendering, 'ආනයනය' or 'සංඛ්‍යාංකනය' might be options, but require careful consideration of context and potential confusion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider whether the transliteration 'ඉංඩෙක්ස්' is appropriate or if a Sinhala alternative is needed. The current usage is acceptable, but worth evaluating for technical accuracy and audience understanding.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "poradie sa zmení" (the order will change) doesn't accurately reflect the English "re-indexed in order". The English implies re-indexing sequentially, not just a change in order.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Funkcia Znovu zoradiť odstráni medzery v indexoch. Súbory budú znovu indexované v poradí, s posunom, aby sa doplnili chýbajúce indexy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'фајлови' is a transliteration from 'files' and while understandable, 'датотеке' is the more standard Serbian translation for 'files' in this context (technical).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: датотеке

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "kaydırma ile sıralı olarak yeniden dizilecektir" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "in order with offset."  'Kaydırma' (offset) is present, but the re-indexing aspect isn't clearly expressed in a way that mimics the English sentence structure. It suggests the files will be shifted rather than re-indexed sequentially with gaps filled.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yeniden sıralama eylemi, eksik indeksleri doldurmak için sıfırdan başlayarak sıralı bir şekilde yeniden dizilecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a passive voice ('...dizilecektir') which is acceptable but could be slightly more direct. Consider active voice for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yeniden sıralama eylemi, eksik indeksleri doldurmak için sıfırdan başlayarak sıralı bir şekilde dizinleri yeniden oluşturacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Змінити порядок" (Change order) doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of "Reorder" in this context. "Reorder" implies a specific rearrangement, not just a change.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Пересортувати" (Resort) or "Переупорядкувати" (Reorganize) for a more precise translation of "Reorder".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'offset to fill in missing indexes' is not accurately translated. 'Offset' doesn't have a direct equivalent that conveys the intended meaning of compensating for removed spaces in the indexes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thao tác Sắp xếp lại sẽ xóa khoảng trắng trong các chỉ mục. Các tập tin sẽ được lập chỉ mục lại theo thứ tự, điều chỉnh để điền vào các chỉ mục bị thiếu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a comma to separate the two sentences. While grammatically acceptable, a period might be more appropriate for a more formal tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thao tác Sắp xếp lại sẽ xóa khoảng trắng trong các chỉ mục. Các tập tin sẽ được lập chỉ mục lại theo thứ tự, điều chỉnh để điền vào các chỉ mục bị thiếu.
